item.title: GDC survey reveals a rocky year of layoffs and AI skepticism for game developers
item.description: The 2025 GDC survey revealed the impact of industry-wide layoffs in 2024 where one of every 11 game developers lost a job.

item.title: X Games will test AI from Google Cloud for judging snowboarding competitions
item.description: Making its debut in Aspen, X Games will leverage AI technology from Google Cloud to enhance objectivity in subjectively judged sports. The aim is to d...

item.title: These are the best-paid programming languages for 2025
item.description: The software developers market is hot. Find out which software languages will earn you the most money this year.

item.title: Deloitte: 74% of enterprises have already met or exceeded gen AI initiatives (but challenges remain)
item.description: Deloitte's state of gen AI report shows that three-quarters of enterprises are seeing ROI and many are set to increase spending.

item.title: Open-source DeepSeek-R1 uses pure reinforcement learning to match OpenAI o1 â€” at 95% less cost
item.description: The company developed DeepSeek-R1 by using pure reinforcement learning on top of DeepSeek-V3-Base, and matched or beat o1 on some benchmarks.
